visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object to render a line chart with the following specifications: Chart type is line, chart title is 'Monthly Average Rainfall', axes and labels styling includes blue color for axis labels and titles, font size of 14px for axis labels, and bold font for titles, data series includes one series named 'Rainfall' with monthly data, custom colors are blue and green, additional configurations include chart margins, background color, and legend settings.
visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object configures a line chart with a title 'Monthly Average Rainfall'. The chart type is set to 'line', and it includes custom styling for axes and labels, such as blue color for axis labels and titles, and a font size of 14px for axis labels. The title text is bold and has a larger font size. The data series includes one series named 'Rainfall' with monthly data points. Custom colors are applied to the series and legend items, with blue for the series and green for the legend text. Additional configurations include chart margins, a light background color, and enabled legend with specific styling.
